Package space.sunqian.common.object.convert.handlers

Class CommonConvertHandler

java.lang.Object
space.sunqian.common.object.convert.handlers.CommonConvertHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
ObjectConverter.Handler
public class CommonConvertHandler extends Object implements ObjectConverter.Handler
The common implementation of ObjectConverter.Handler, also be the default last handler of ObjectConverter.defaultConverter().

This handler providers the common conversion logic for all types. This is a table showing the conversion logic of this handler for different target types:

Target Source Conversion Logic
String, CharSequence InputStream, ReadableByteChannel, Reader, ByteBuffer, byte[] Using ConvertOption.ioOperator(IOOperator) and ConvertOption.charset(Charset) to decode to string.
char[] Using String(char[]) to construct to string.
BigDecimal Using BigDecimal.toPlainString().
Date and Time Objects Using ConvertOption.timeFormatter(DateFormatter) to handle.
Others Using Object.toString().
byte[], char[], ByteBuffer, CharBuffer String Using String.getBytes(Charset) or String.toCharArray().
Numbers String Using NumberKit.toNumber(CharSequence, Class).
Other Numbers Using NumberKit.toNumber(Number, Class).
long and Long Date and Time Returns epoch milliseconds of the date or time object.
boolean and Boolean Numbers false for 0, otherwise true.
String true for equalsIgnoreCase("true"), otherwise false.
Date and Time String and Other Date Time Objects Using ConvertOption.timeFormatter(DateFormatter) to handle.
long and Long Treated as an epoch milliseconds, then using ConvertOption.timeFormatter(DateFormatter) to handle.
Enums Any Objects Using EnumKit.findEnum(Class, String) with the name from Object.toString().
Array and Collection Objects Array or Iterable Objects Array created using reflection. Collection created using its constructor, the supported collection types: Iterable, Collection, List, AbstractList, ArrayList, LinkedList, CopyOnWriteArrayList, Set, LinkedHashSet, HashSet, TreeSet, ConcurrentSkipListSet. After creating the container, uses the converter parameter to handle component types.
Map and Data Objects Any Objects Generating data object is based on ConvertOption.builderProvider(ObjectBuilderProvider) and ConvertOption.dataMapper(DataMapper). Generating map using its constructor, and copying properties also using ConvertOption.dataMapper(DataMapper). The supported map types: Map, AbstractMap, LinkedHashMap, HashMap, TreeMap, ConcurrentMap, ConcurrentHashMap, Hashtable, ConcurrentSkipListMap.

Note that this handler typically creates new objects and does not perform the same handing as AssignableConvertHandler.

    • convert

      public Object convert(@Nullable @Nullable Object src, @Nonnull @Nonnull Type srcType, @Nonnull @Nonnull Type target, @Nonnull @Nonnull ObjectConverter converter, @Nonnull @Nonnull Option<?,?> @Nonnull ... options) throws Exception
      Description copied from interface: ObjectConverter.Handler
      Converts the given source object to the given target type.
      Specified by:
      convert in interface ObjectConverter.Handler
      Parameters:
      src - the given source object
      srcType - the specified type of the given source object
      target - the specified type of the target object
      converter - the converter where this handler in
      options - the other conversion options
      Returns:
      the converted object, null is permitted, or ObjectConverter.Status.HANDLER_CONTINUE / ObjectConverter.Status.HANDLER_BREAK if conversion failed
      Throws:
      Exception - any exception can be thrown here
